procedure.title: Prerequisites
procedure.para: To send messages from &abbrev; to Elasticsearch, complete the following steps.

step.para: Download the Elasticsearch libraries version 1.5 or newer from the 1.x line from https://www.elastic.co/downloads/elasticsearch.&vendor; tests the destination using Elasticsearch version 1.5. To use Elasticsearch 2.x or newer, use the elasticsearch2() destination (see ).

Extract the Elasticsearch libraries into a temporary directory, then collect the various .jar files into a single directory (for example, /opt/elasticsearch/lib/) where &abbrev; can access them. You must specify this directory in the &abbrev; configuration file. The files are located in the lib directory and its subdirectories of the Elasticsearch release package.
